short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open multiple search engines with one query

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Searchy offers a choice every time you want to search a text on the internet.

Searchy allows you to search multiple search engines with one term. 

Add or modify groups and engines.

Two contextmenus are available:
- On selection: Open Searchy with the selected text as a search term.
- On page: Add a page as a search engine to Searchy.

Click on help-tour to make yourself familiar with the controls.

Click on the eye icon in the upper right corner to toggle dark mode.

Right-click on a group header to pick a color, or open all engines.

Right-click on an engine to set it as default.

Export/import all groups with their engines.
Export/import one group.

New in 0.8:

All is now on one page (no options).

Removed omnibox setting.
Removed history.
